captions.text: (light jazz piano)

- Whats up? What're we
gonna get done today?
- Ummm...

How do I tell him what I
want him to do with my hair?
Like, shorter.
Like the same shape but with less hair.
Is that stupid?
(sighs) Whatever, it'll grow back.
I wonder if my hair smells bad.
Can hair smell bad?
How would you know?

Is he making conversation
because he thinks I want to talk
or because he actually wants to talk?

Does he realize we had the
same exact conversation
last time I got my hair cut?
How much do you tip a barber?
Should I Google it?
Can I Google it without him noticing?

It's weird that hair
is just always growing.

Like it's always just
slowly oozing out of me.

I have an itch on my
nose, should I itch it?
I just moved my hands under the sheet.

Did it look like I was
just touching my penis?
Alright, I'm just gonna touch my nose
so that he knows that that's what I was
trying to do in the first place.

What do they do with all
the hair on the floor?
Do they throw it out with regular trash?

Or do they have to throw
it out in a special trash,
like with cans of paint and batteries.

I always just throw my
batteries in the regular trash.

He's really spending a lot of
time on that part of my head.

He didn't do that on the
other side of the head.
Do I have a weirdly shaped head?
Ok, he's showing me the back.

It actually just looks
like the back of my head.
Would I know if it didn't look good?
Maybe I could cut my own hair.
I mean, how hard is it?
I bet I could cut my own hair.
Thank you very much
- [Barber] You're very welcome.
You want some dreads,
you want to get some extensions in there?
- [Man] Yeah
- [Barber] You wanna get some cute shells.
- [Man] Shells are nice, I like shells.
- [Barber] Shells we can do.

- [Man] Can you do shells
on hair that's this short?
- [Barber] You can get, like, a little
thing in the back right here.
That'd be kinda cute right?
Like, what about a look like this,

like, all, like look, if
you were bald, look at this.

comments.author: Megan Gamble

comments.text:
All I think is just:
1) About 45 seconds into the cut "THAT'S PERFECT! But I don't want to stop 
it here, I'll have to pay the money for a regular cut even though barely 
anything has been taken off"
2) Okay, quite a lot of hair is off...
3) I'm starting to look ridiculous now...
4) Did they hear me correctly when I said "Just a small trim", because I'm 
pretty sure I didn't say "Shave it all off"
5) Ah... Shit... The point of no return. I look like an idiot now, and will 
look like one for a good few weeks...
6) Wow... I am actually really fucking ugly...
7) When they are finished: "Yeah thank you! Looks great!"

I can NEVER express disappointment or anger towards people I don't know, no 
matter how shit my haircut is, I will always say it looks very good and I 
will definitely come back. I guess that's because I'm British (we here in 
the UK really don't like talking to strangers, and even worse, telling a 
stranger that you don't like the haircut they just gave you)﻿

comments.author: Jorge Salinas

comments.text:
My mind every time I get my fringe cut:
*Oh, God he's doing the fringe now. HOLD YOUR BREATH. Where do I look? If I 
look down, I'm either looking at my crotch, HOLD YOUR BREATH or his crotch. 
If I look straight ahead, will I get hair in my eyes, or will I just end up 
staring into the hairdresser's eyes like a freak. OH MY GOD I DIDN'T HOLD 
MY BREATH NOW I CAN'T BREATH OR I'LL INHALE HAIR Oh it's over okay. Why is 
eye contact so uncomfortable? It's staring at a squishy HOLDING MY BREATH 
thing that moves around in a damp hole connected to a lump of noodles that 
make us who we are! Oh, God. Where have I been looking this whole time? 
HOLD IT HOLD IT I CAN'T BREATH Oh, my eyes are closed. Does that make it 
seem like I'm enjoying this too much, or I just want to get it over with? 
Quit smiling, it's creepy. Don't have such a straight face, it's creepy.*﻿
comments.author: cloudanimal

comments.text:
My hair cut experience: 
1- Please don't cut your knuckle while using scissors, it's happened before.
2- Oh god, will they think i don't bathe because I still have hair product 
in. 
3- I don't know how to describe my hair, so I guess I'll say fade so maybe 
they won't ruin my hair.
4- Oh, great this person is hurrying and looks very tired... I bet my hair 
will be all jacked.
5- Don't move your hands under this hair blanket... for any reason, unless 
you move them out of it right after.
6- I don't really want to talk, so would it be rude if I ignored you?

lol﻿

comments.text:
(I have really long hair) 
"Should I cut it into a bob" 
"What if I hate it"
"Long hair is such a bother it would take me like thirty seconds to wash my 
hair" 
"Maybe I should shave it for cancer patients"
"UGH WHY DO BOYS LOOK SO GOOD WITH SHAVED HEADS"
"Wow that smells really good"
"Please keep washing my hair forever"
*falls asleep* 
*lady moves my head violently* 
"ARE YOU TRYING TO KILL ME" 
*lady cuts my hair to short* 
"OH MY GOD NO"
Lady: so do you like it?! 
Me: yes it looks really good! 
*cries in car for ten minutes*
"Let's never do that ever again" 
﻿
